A '''thick potion''' is a potion that provides no effects. {{IN|bedrock}}, it can be used to brew [[potions of Weakness]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Brewing ===
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Glowstone Dust
|base = Water Bottle
|Thick Potion
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Gunpowder
|base = Thick Potion
|Thick Splash Potion
|name = Thick Splash Potion
}}
{{Brewing
|Dragon's Breath
|base = Thick Splash Potion
|Thick Lingering Potion
|name = Thick Lingering Potion
|ingredients = [[Dragon's Breath]] +<br> '''Thick Splash Potion'''
|foot=1
}}

== Usage ==
===Base potion===
{{IN|bedrock}}:

Only usable as an alternative base for potion of Weakness.

{{Brewing
|base = Thick Potion
|Fermented Spider Eye
|Potion of Weakness
|showvariants=1
}}

=== Lingering potion ===
{{IN|bedrock}}, a lingering thick potion acts similar to the [[lingering water bottle]], being able to extinguish burning entities and damage [[endermen]], [[blaze]]s, and [[snow golem]]s, but without the ability to put out fires.

=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{Crafting

}}
